original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields down at open, rupee at 318.50/319 against the USD
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT-  Sri Lanka’s bond yields were slightly down at open on Monday, while the rupee opened at 318.50/319 against the US dollar in the spot market, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 was quoted at 27.70/90 percent, slightly down from 27.90/28.00 percent.
The rupee closed at 318.50/31.00 against the US dollar in the spot market appreciated from the last close at 319.00/40. (Colombo/May08/2023)
